title: Black carpet, $75m project, Trump by her side: Inside Melania Trump’s documentary premiere
summary_full: A glitzy premiere in Washington celebrated the $75 million documentary 'Melania,' chronicling the former First Lady's return to the White House.  Attended by administration figures and celebrities, the film offers rare insight into Melania Trump's perspective.  Amazon and director Brett Ratner deny any political motive behind the significant investment.
